description: If you ever lose your phone and somebody finds it, how will they contact you?  "Found this Phone?" is the answer.  All you need is a minute to enter a message, an alternate number, and an email address somebody can use to contact you.  Then, if anybody ever finds your phone and looks for your contact information, they will be greeted by a very obvious "Found this Phone?" icon and will have the option to press one button to call you, one button to email you, and read any message you have written for them.   NOTE:  IF YOU USE A PIN CODE TO LOCK YOUR PHONE, THIS APP WILL NOT WORK SINCE IT WOULD REQUIRE THE FINDER OF YOUR PHONE TO KNOW THE PIN.  (But if, like most people, you don't use one, then it's $0.99 for peace of mind that can't be beat!)
